title: Apple Leaf Disease Detection
description: This is my minor project. I built an web app that can predict the diseases of an apple leaf.

title: ToDo List
description: This app allows users to add, complete, and delete tasks, with tasks being stored in the browser's local storage.

title: Weather App
description: The Weather App,uses the OpenWeatherMap API to provide real-time weather information for any specified city and country code.

title: Spotify
description: This is a simple music player, mimicking some Spotify-like behavior
